lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild led an Austrian sweep in the women’s World Cup season opener yesterday, winning a slalom by 0.80 of a second in Levi, Finland. Schild, who led by 0.60 after the first run, had a two-run total of 1 minute 45.66 seconds down Levi’s Black course.
